::Aerotaur::
    He saw the dragon land.  As the shots were fired he dove forward under 
the shots.  He landed near Lambda's gun and tossed it up into the shots.  One 
hit it and disintegrated it.  That was one less problem.  He picked himself 
up and dashed at Luzbel.  "I have no intention of dying today."  He draws his 
staff and slashes at the large gun.
